item.title: Rocket Science: Designing a model rocket using OpenRocket and simulating to analyze the results
item.description: In this project we designed a model rocket using OpenRocket software to the specifications provided below: Wet mass : 700 gms(minimum) Body tube outer diameter : 4.5 cm - 6 cm Body tube thickness : 0.3 cm Body tube material : Cardboard Flight computer mass : 150 gm Flight computer width : 2.8 cm Flight computer length : 16 cm Avionics Bay, Nose Cone, Motor Mount, Fins Material : PLA
